body_html: No, we can merge this PR any time, but it won't be in the 1.3 branch, and if anyone installs the 1.3 binary they won't see it's effects. The branches are cut every 6 weeks or so. I don't want to encourage aiming features at specific releases. The deadline is usually not good for quality. But if you say loud and early that you think a feature should be in the next release (and if it is ready), then we can plan for that. This feature wasn't ready in time for 1.3 (~2 weeks ago) anyway, so not much point in hurrying too much.

body:
No, we can merge this PR any time, but it won't be in the 1.3 branch, and
if anyone installs the 1.3 binary they won't see it's effects.

The branches are cut every 6 weeks or so. I don't want to encourage aiming
features at specific releases. The deadline is usually not good for
quality. But if you say loud and early that you think a feature should be
in the next release (and if it is ready), then we can plan for that. This
feature wasn't ready in time for 1.3 (~2 weeks ago) anyway, so not much
point in hurrying too much.
